text: Classroom with students sitting at their desks. Julia stands at the front beside a projector.
Let’s talk about environmental awareness. We all know that pollution is a big problem today. There are different kinds of pollution: air, water and land.
Medium shot – Julia points to a slide with photos of pollution and recycling bins.
We can all help protect the environment by recycling, saving energy and using less plastic. Simple things like turning off lights or using a reusable bottle make a big difference.
I think air pollution is the worst. There’s too much traffic.
What about waste? People throw away so much plastic.
Yes, that’s true. We should try to reuse and recycle things instead of buying new ones all the time.
Claire raises her hand and speaks while others listen.
I agree. My family has started using cloth bags instead of plastic ones.
That’s a great idea. Small changes like that really help reduce pollution.
